title: The Wind and Snow - Novel Updates
tags: Calm Protagonist   Carefree Protagonist   Fanfiction   God Protagonist   Loli   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Pirates   Playful Protagonist   Transported to Another World
author: Yc鱼
description:
“I am—Xiao Bai!” 

In the majestic snowstorm, Xiao Bai’s roar shocked all creation. It was not a threatening roar, but a joyful announcement: “The road to the strongest, I will walk alone…”

 This is also the story of the God of Snow Snow Fruit fighting against the world in the world of One Piece.>
